query.statement:
SELECT A.MAKE_MM ,A.PSPID , TRIM(CHAR(INT(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.MAKE_MM )))) AS RNO ,CASE WHEN A.RNOT = 1 THEN '신규' ELSE '이월' END PLAN ,A.BSTNK ,A.ACTION ,A.TYPE ,A.GUBUN ,A.CONTENT ,A.NETWR ,A.ERNAMNM ,A.DEPT FROM ( SELECT A.MAKE_MM ,A.PSPID ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.PSPID ORDER BY A.PSPID, A.MAKE_MM) RNOT ,B. BSTNK ,A.ACTION ,A.TYPE ,A.GUBUN ,(SELECT B.CONTENT FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0404 AS B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.PSPID fetch first 1 rows only) AS CONTENT ,(SELECT SUM(SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(Z.NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) )) FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0404 AS Z WHERE A.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND A.PSPID=Z.PSPID) AS NETWR , (SELECT X.NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0011 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.TEMNO = A.PERSON_NM) AS ERNAMNM ,A.DEPT
FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0403 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCURRCHG AS E ON E.MANDT = B.MANDT AND E.WAERK = B.WAERK
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MAKE_MM BETWEEN SUBSTR(#MAKF_DTT#,1,6) AND SUBSTR(#MAKT_DTT#,1,6)
AND A.DEPT = #DEPT#
AND A.TEAM = #TEAM#
) A
